verses.verse: שַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> shal-Lach Cast לַחְמְךָ֖ <WH3899> lach-me-Cha thy bread עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei upon הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim; the waters כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- after בְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> ve-Ro it after many הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim days תִּמְצָאֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH4672> tim-tza-'En-nu. for thou shalt find

תֶּן־ <WH5414> ten- Give חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> Che-lek a portion לְשִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> le-shiv-'Ah to seven וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> ve-Gam even לִשְׁמוֹנָ֑ה <WH8083> lish-mo-Nah; and also to eight כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not תֵדַ֔ע <WH3045> te-Da', for thou knowest מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what יִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh may occur רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah not what evil עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. shall be upon the earth

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If יִמָּלְא֨וּ <WH4390> yim-mal-'U be full הֶעָבִ֥ים <WH5645> he-'a-Vim If the clouds גֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <WH1653> ge-shem of rain עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz [themselves] upon the earth יָרִ֔יקוּ <WH7324> ya-Ri-ku, they empty וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- and whether יִפּ֥וֹל <WH5307> yip-Pol fall עֵ֛ץ <WH6086> 'etz and if the tree בַּדָּר֖וֹם <WH1864> bad-da-Rom toward the south וְאִ֣ם <WH518> ve-'Im If בַּצָּפ֑וֹן <WH6828> batz-tza-Fon; or toward the north מְק֛וֹם <WH4725> me-Kom in the place שֶׁיִּפּ֥וֹל <WH5307> shei-yip-Pol falleth הָעֵ֖ץ <WH6086> ha-'Etz where the tree שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> sham there יְהֽוּא׃ <WH1933> ye-Hu. there it shall be

שֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> sho-Mer He that observeth ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach the wind לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo will not יִזְרָ֑ע <WH2232> yiz-Ra'; shall not sow וְרֹאֶ֥ה <WH7200> ve-ro-'Eh and he that regardeth בֶעָבִ֖ים <WH5645> ve-'a-Vim the clouds לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo will not יִקְצֽוֹר׃ <WH7114> yik-Tzor. shall not reap

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher who אֵֽינְךָ֤ <WH369> 'ei-ne-Cha not יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <WH3045> yo-De-a' As thou knowest מַה־ <WH4100> mah- how long דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech not what [is] the way הָר֔וּחַ <WH7307> ha-Ru-ach, of the spirit כַּעֲצָמִ֖ים <WH6106> ka-'a-tza-Mim [nor] how the bones בְּבֶ֣טֶן <WH990> be-Ve-ten [do grow] in the womb הַמְּלֵאָ֑ה <WH4392> ham-me-le-'Ah; of her that is with child כָּ֗כָה <WH3602> Ka-chah, so לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo not תֵדַע֙ <WH3045> te-Da' even so thou knowest אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh not the works הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ya-'a-Seh who maketh אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> hak-Kol. all

בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> bab-Bo-ker In the morning זְרַ֣ע <WH2232> ze-Ra' sow אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <WH2233> zar-'E-cha, thy seed וְלָעֶ֖רֶב <WH6153> ve-la-'E-rev and in the evening אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תַּנַּ֣ח <WH3240> tan-Nach withhold יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> ya-De-cha; not thine hand כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki for אֵֽינְךָ֨ <WH369> 'ei-ne-Cha for יוֹדֵ֜ע <WH3045> yo-De' for thou knowest אֵ֣י <WH335> 'ei not whether זֶ֤ה <WH2088> zeh morning יִכְשָׁר֙ <WH3787> yich-Shar shall prosper הֲזֶ֣ה <WH2088> ha-Zeh morning אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or זֶ֔ה <WH2088> Zeh, morning וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- whether שְׁנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH8147> she-nei-Hem either this or that or whether they both כְּאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> ke-'e-Chad [shall be] alike טוֹבִֽים׃ <WH2896> to-Vim. good

וּמָת֖וֹק <WH4966> u-ma-Tok [is] sweet הָא֑וֹר <WH216> ha-'Or; Truly the light וְט֥וֹב <WH2896> ve-Tov and a pleasant לַֽעֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> la-'ei-Na-yim [thing it is] for the eyes לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> lir-'ot to behold אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> hash-Sha-mesh. the sun

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki Indeed אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if שָׁנִ֥ים <WH8141> sha-Nim years הַרְבֵּ֛ה <WH7235> har-Beh many יִחְיֶ֥ה <WH2421> yich-Yeh live הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> ha-'a-Dam But if a man בְּכֻלָּ֣ם <WH3605> be-chul-Lam all יִשְׂמָ֑ח <WH8055> yis-Mach; [and] rejoice וְיִזְכֹּר֙ <WH2142> ve-yiz-Kor in them all yet let him remember אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> ye-Mei the days הַחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> ha-Cho-shech, of darkness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Indeed הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> har-Beh for they shall be many יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu become כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- Everything שֶׁבָּ֥א <WH935> sheb-Ba All that cometh הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> Ha-vel. [is] vanity

שְׂמַ֧ח <WH8055> se-Mach Rejoice בָּח֣וּר <WH970> ba-Chur O young man בְּיַלְדוּתֶ֗יךָ <WH3208> be-yal-du-Tei-cha, in thy youth וִֽיטִֽיבְךָ֤ <WH3190> vi-ti-ve-Cha be pleasant לִבְּךָ֙ <WH3820> lib-be-Cha and let thy heart בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> bi-Mei thee in the days בְחוּרוֹתֶ֔ךָ <WH979> ve-chu-ro-Te-cha, of thy youth וְהַלֵּךְ֙ <WH1980> ve-hal-leCh and walk בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> be-dar-Chei in the ways לִבְּךָ֔ <WH3820> lib-be-Cha, of thine heart וּבְמַרְאֵ֖י <WH4758> u-ve-mar-'Ei and in the sight עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha; of thine eyes וְדָ֕ע <WH3045> ve-Da' but know כִּ֧י <WH3588> ki for עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- for all אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these יְבִֽיאֲךָ֥ <WH935> ye-vi-'a-Cha will bring הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him thou that for all these [things] God בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> bam-mish-Pat. thee into judgment

וְהָסֵ֥ר <WH5493> ve-ha-Ser Therefore remove כַּ֙עַס֙ <WH3708> ka-'as sorrow מִלִּבֶּ֔ךָ <WH3820> mil-lib-Be-cha, from thy heart וְהַעֲבֵ֥ר <WH5674> ve-ha-'a-Ver and put away רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah evil מִבְּשָׂרֶ֑ךָ <WH1320> mib-be-sa-Re-cha; from thy flesh כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because הַיַּלְד֥וּת <WH3208> hai-yal-Dut for childhood וְהַֽשַּׁחֲר֖וּת <WH7839> ve-hash-sha-cha-Rut and youth הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> Ha-vel. [are] vanity
